Class LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number>

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>
All Implemented Interfaces:
NumberTypeAgnostic<N>, LinearModel<N>, EstimationFunction<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable, ScalarEstimationFunction<N>, TrainableScalarFunction<N>, UnaryEstimationFunction<N>, TrainableFunction<N>
@Strategy(CONCRETE) public class LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number> extends Object implements LinearModel<N>, TrainableScalarFunction<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable, UnaryEstimationFunction<N>

    • getHyperparameters

      public Map<String,Object> getHyperparameters()
      Description copied from interface: HyperparameterConfigurable
      Returns a snapshot of all current hyperparameters.

      The returned map should contain stable, human-readable keys (such as "learningRate" or "momentum") mapped to their current values. Implementations are encouraged to return a defensive copy so that external modifications do not affect the internal state.

      Specified by:
      getHyperparameters in interface HyperparameterConfigurable
      Returns:
      an immutable or defensive copy of the current hyperparameters

      public N[] calculateParameterGradients(N[] inputs)
      Description copied from interface: TrainableScalarFunction
      Calculates the gradients of the scalar function with respect to its trainable parameters, given the input values.
      Specified by:
      calculateParameterGradients in interface TrainableScalarFunction<N extends Number>
      Parameters:
      inputs - the input feature vector to the function
      Returns:
      an array of partial derivatives ∂f/∂θ_k for each parameter θ_k
